casebody.data:
Annah AWARTANI; Gilma Varinia Bonilla; Crystal Kim Parker, individually and for others similarly situated
v.
The MOSES H. CONE MEMORIAL HOSPITAL OPERATING CORPORATION No. 426P17 Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 1, 2018 Robert J. King, III, Attorney at Law, Daniel F.E. Smith, Attorney at Law, Elizabeth Troutman, Attorney at Law, Greensboro, for Awartani, Annah, et al. Maureen D. Murray, Attorney at Law, Greensboro, Matthew N. Leerberg, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for The Moses H. Cone Memorial Hospital Operating Corporation.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the conditional petition filed on the 21st of December 2017 by Defendant in this matter for discretionary review Prior to a Determination by the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Dismissed as moot by order of the Court in conference, this the 1st of March 2018."
